alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 09 at 11:29PM CDT until June 10 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR COLLINGSWORTH COUNTY... At 1129 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Vinson to 4 miles northwest of Dodson to 8 miles south of Wellington, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Dodson, Lutie, Samnorwood and Quail. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
